body.name: Amazon Basics Classic 8-inch Chef’s Knife with Three Rivets, Silver
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 45 mins
features: This 8- inch chef’s knife is a versatile tool for cutting, chopping, dicing, mincing and more
High carbon stainless steel blade with a satin finish that is stain, rust and pit resistant
Forged stainless steel construction with a full tang, 8” blade and three rivets
Semi bolster design adds weight and balance while also ensuring full blade access when chopping or sharpening

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Amazon Basics Classic Chef Knife with Three Rivets, 6.5-Inches or 8-Inches Chef's Knife Ideal for everyday food prep tasks, this chef's knife makes easy work of chopping fruits and vegetables, mincing herbs, slicing meat, and more. Full Tang Blade The knife's full tang blade extends fully through the handle for extra strength. Double Bolster The double bolster includes a full bolster for comfort and control, plus a second bolster at the butt of the knife for added weight and balance. 3 Rivet Handle The ergonomic triple rivet handle fits comfortably in the hand for a secure grip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive but not cheap
reviews.reviewText: This is a very well made knife- rivaling some of my nicer name brands. I bought two for gifts for the holidays and they did not disappoint. Comes sharp and ready to use out of the box! And at this price point you don’t have to take my word for it, you can try one for yourself. I found the balance to be really nice as well- overall a really high quality knife that holds an edge well, for a low price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sharp knife , great value
reviews.reviewText: The knife is very sharp and has stayed sharp with over a month of constant use. It seems very sturdy and could last a long time. At this price if the knife fails after a year I am satisfied…but I think it will remain useful much longer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp, Sharp, Sharp!
reviews.reviewText: I must say, it has exceeded my expectations. The sharpness of this knife is truly impressive – it effortlessly slices through ingredients.One of the standout features for me is its lightweight design. This knife feels incredibly comfortable in hand, and the thin blade adds to its maneuverability.The balance of the knife is very nice. It feels like an extension of my hand, allowing for precise control while chopping vegetables or slicing meats.Overall, I highly recommend the Amazon Basics Chef's Knife, I couldn't be more satisfied with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Chopping Champ: This Knife Won't Let You Down!
reviews.reviewText: Let's be honest, most of us just want a good quality chef's knife that gets the job done without breaking the bank. And this Amazon Basics 8-incher? It delivers! First off, the quality is legit. The blade is sharp (like, seriously sharp - watch your fingers!), feels sturdy, and has held its edge well so far. No more hacking through veggies like I'm taming a jungle! Plus, the handle is comfy, even after I'm on a kitchen roll. But the real winner here is the price. Let's just say I wasn't expecting Michelin-star quality for the price I paid, but this little guy surprised me. It's become my go-to knife for everything from chopping veggies to slicing meat, and it hasn't let me down once. If you're looking for a no-nonsense, high-quality knife that won't put a dent in your wallet, this is it. Trust me, this Amazon Basics knife is a kitchen hero in disguise!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They spared every expense.Minimal packing and wasteI would have been OK if it was bubble wrapped safely.For a 14 dollar knife I'm very impressed.It's a scalpel out of the box, razor sharp do not drop and grab for it.Solid 3 rivet 1 piece blade with mystery plastic handle material and just what I wanted.I can fearlessly abuse this knife and not care!!!I forsee years maybe decades of abuse in its future.I am a retired chef, which means I still cook way too often and tend to give blades away to people learning.This would be a better than house grade restaurant knife. House blades are owned by the house and passed around like the barracks bunny. This blade feels like it can take it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value and Very Sharp
reviews.reviewText: I’ve always had a J.A Henckels or Zwilling knife in my arsenal with the thought that something that is more expensive means it is much better but I was wrong, do not underestimate these Amazon knifes, they are sturdy, very sharp and a third of the cost than the aforementioned brands. I am definitely getting a 2nd pair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good knife for the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a cheap substitute while I dropped my hood knives off for sharpening. I was pleasantly surprised at the sharpness and overall feel and weight of the knife. For an economy knife hard to go wrong for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You Call that a Knife? Yes... Its a Knife
reviews.reviewText: I've purchased many high-end knives and it makes a world of difference when chopping vegetables. But Im visiting my parents for the holidays and their knives suck. So I wanted a high quality but inexpensive knife to leave at their house. And this Amazon knife was exactly that! Good weight, well made, sturdy and sharp. Def recommend. But keep in mind ALL knives get dull, you MUST buy a knife sharpener. I don't know why some people think a knife will stay sharp forever by itself. But this knife is great, and with a quick sharpening it does it job.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fantastic chef's knife! Well worth the money.
reviews.reviewText: Very impressed with this knife. It has weight on the handle for easy chopping, it's super sharp, and it's a excellent value for the home chef. Well worth it, five stars!
Supera con mucho mis expectativas. Es de muy buen material y construcción. Trae un filo increíble. Se afila muy bien y su peso es el adecuado para un cuchillo de cocina.

The media could not be loaded. Desde hace tiempo estaba buscando un cuchillo de chef, aunque le pensé mucho, este no me decepcionó, tiene buen peso, buena calidad en los materiales y el filo se compara al de marcas más caras, ya es el segundo que compro y fue un excelente regalo de navidad, definitivamente lo recomiendo, espero que incorporen uno estilo Santoku
I was curious as to how good a 16 dollar knife could be. Turns out it's pretty good. Sharp. Great balance. I'd buy another if need be.
Me sorprendió la calidad de este cuchillo, textura y agarre profesional, con muchísimo filo! 10/10 recomendado para cualquier cocina y uso profesional
